channel.title: Blogs on Make Yourself Designs
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Make Yourself Designs

item.title: TESTER
item.description: Getting ready to go out with friends is one of my favorite activities; looking cute, doing my makeup, the whole thing. However, getting ready for work or school? This is one of my least favorite because if you’re like me, you’re constantly checking your clock to make sure you have time for x y and z. If you’re tired of racing out the door, keep reading because I am going to show you some easy things to incorporate into your routine that will help you get ready for work in 30 minutes or less.

item.title: How to Apply Liquid Lipstick
item.description: Liquid Lipstick can be scary, it can be intimidating, and it can be challenging even for someone who wears it daily. You want to find that balance between overline and just enough without going too far out of the lines. It can get messy and that’s why i’m here to help. First Step: Find the right Liquid Lipstick for you Liquid Lipsticks come in a variety of finishes, while most are of the matte variety, there are also satin and glossy.

item.title: Best Drugstore Lipsticks
item.description: Shopping the drugstore is not only convenient, but its budget friendly. Especially in this day and age; drugstore makeup brands have been keeping up with makeup trends and really developing products with quality comparable to Sephora brands, and it’s all at our fingertips. Are you ready to make yourself over with a new affordable lip? Here are some of my favorite lipsticks the drugstore has to offer that are the best bang for your buck (yeah and some of these are almost one buck!
